none.description:
{Fleet Foot}

School: Air
Proficiency: None.

{green|Bless}:
+500 to maximum movement points.

{red|Curse}:
-20% to Attack, Defence and Power,
-5% experience gain.

{#6d38ff|Ingredients} costs:
-200 gold,
-1 Gems.

{#38e8ff|Duration}:
All the effects remain until next week.
